scenario_text.value: (That’s...Shuuji and Lopmon?)
Why the heck are you following me?!
B-but, I have to stay with you, Shuuji...
Why bother? You can’t do anything anyway!

Use your head, why don’t you?! Help someone
else, or go out on patrol!
Ugh... B-but if I’m not around, then you’ll—

You wanna blame me for your uselessness?!
So you’re incompetent AND a coward!
No... No I’m not...
Shuuji! That’s going too far!
Takuma... This is our problem. Don’t butt in.
Then you have to listen to Lopmon!

Agumon’s right. Why don’t you try talking
things out for a change?
...Fine, if you’re going to go that far.
Lopmon, what is it you want to say to Shuuji?
Ungh... *sniff*... I, I need to be with him.

And why is that? He won’t be in danger if
you’re a little far apart, will he?

It’s not that... Not about danger. Um...
I just have to be with him.

(This is rough. I have no idea what he’s
saying...)

Hmph, can’t even explain yourself properly.
You’re completely useless.
Nnngh...

(What an awful thing to say. If anyone said
that to me, I’d lose all motivation.)

(Still, his attitude is an even bigger
problem, isn’t it? His views toward Lopmon.)

(Hmm, maybe I should get Lopmon motivated so
Shuuji will recognize him?)
(What should I say here?)
Don’t talk like that.
Time to be a leader.
Do your best, Lopmon!

You shouldn’t talk like that, Shuuji. Why do
you have to be so harsh?

This is harsh? I’d call it a kindness. The
discipline I received was way more intense.

I don’t know what you’ve had to deal with,
but take a good look at Lopmon here.
*sniff*...*sob*...

He’s crying, you know? What sort of kindness
makes a person cry?

That’s just because he’s weak... I’ll whip
him into shape.

Lopmon hates this! You have to stop doing
things this way!

Shut up, shut up! Outsiders should keep their
mouth shut!

Shuuji, now’s the time to show your stuff as
a leader.
Wh-what...?
Lopmon may be weak and timid.

But if you can help him grow big and strong,
wouldn’t that show your leadership ability?

Huh... That’s true. It’d prove my potential
for leading.

(Good, sounds like he’s interested in the
idea. Maybe he’ll change a bit.)

Do your best, Lopmon! Isn’t it frustrating
being talked to like that?!
Rrrgh...

Stand tall, and say what you’ve gotta say!
Go on, now!
B-but I caaan’t...

...Hmph, he can’t do it even with you running
interference for him. He really is useless.
(That...was definitely my bad.)

Hmm... I see. If this guy’s weak, I just need
to make him strong myself.
What?

Yeah, he’ll definitely get stronger if I
train him directly. I’m a leader, after all.
Um, Shuuji? What are you—

Come on, you. Just as you asked, I’ll stay
with you.
Really...?

Yeah. Stick close, I’ll make sure to train
you well.
...Yeah, okay!

Takuma... Something about Shuuji’s eyes
scares me...

(Now they’re together, just like Lopmon
wanted.)

(But I feel like Shuuji’s taking things is
a weird direction...)

My training is strict. No complaining
allowed!
All right!
